an9.62:4.1: “Mendicants, without giving up nine things you can’t realize perfection.
an9.62:4.3: Greed, hate, delusion, anger, hostility, denigration, insolence, jealousy, and stinginess.
an9.62:4.4: Without giving up these nine things you can’t realize perfection.
an9.62:5.1: After giving up nine things you can realize perfection.
an9.62:5.3: Greed, hate, delusion, anger, hostility, denigration, insolence, jealousy, and stinginess.
an9.62:5.4: After giving up these nine things you can realize the fruit of perfection.”
